amendment.description: To enhance intelligence community efforts to bring Osama bin Laden and other key leaders of al Qaeda to the justice they deserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4907 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 235.

action.text: Amendment SA 4907 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S9075-9082 ; text: CR 9075) To enhance intelligence community efforts to bring Osama bin Laden and other key leaders of al Qaeda to the justice they deserve.
